DOC.brief_summary: To determine bioequivalence two 5-mg tablet lecozotan new 10-mg tablet lecozotan .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Lecozotan SR Two 5-mg Tablets Vs. Lecozotan SR One 10-mg Tablet Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Generally healthy , man woman , age 18 50 year . Exclusion criterion : History active presence clinically important medical disease .
